name: existentially
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that relates to existence or being alive: We are all existentially vulnerable to the effects of climate change. The experience is existentially different for each artist. Related words
existential
existence
in a way that relates to a philosophy (= system of ideas) according to which the world has no meaning and each person is alone and completely responsible for his or her own actions: Existentially, suffering is a basic part of life. I believe that existentially, every sacrifice is sacrifice of yourself. Related words
existential
existentialism
More examplesFewer examplesTheir lives are not affected existentially by crime or violence, although these problems can be found in their communities.Existentially, the alternative to that existence is nothingness.They are morally and existentially fearful and tired.
